page.title: 12CENSUS DATA
page.content:
This information, based upon the 1981 Census, applies to the whole of Madeley and not just our area, but it does give a guide to the size and make-up of the village: Population: 4373 (Age groups:0-4:5.2% 5-15:16% ; 16-24:13% ; 25-39:20% ; 40-59:28% ; 60+:17% )
Number of households: 1575
Housing tenure (% of total households)
Owner occupied ............66 Council ...................22 Housing Association ....... 0.4 Business rented ........... 0.6 Employment rented ......... 2.5 Other unfurnished rented .. 6.1 Other furnished rented .... 2.2 Non-permanent ............. 0.2
